Articles.Content:
So I assume that this isn't going to be possible- but is there some way to make an SAS unit I can turn OFF? I mean, they're -great- when you're in orbit but on launch they can nearly shake a ship apart!

Edited July 17, 2013 by Tassyr
Clarity

press t to toggle SAS/ASAS

if you want action groups for toggling SAS/ASAS there may already be a mod

I was thinking more to toggle in terms of individual SAS units. not just the "T" thing. Because as it is they're all on, or all off- so if you're launching something like a space station with a powerful SAS, it damn near shakes the rocket to bits if you use SAS at any point.
Maybe this is what you are wanting.... http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/togglable-asas/
not quite- that's for ASAS, not SAS. But close.
It should work for SAS also as the same .cfg values are being toggled on and off.
So odd that the devs added this in the latest version. Thank you, Devs! XD
yep! you can toggle the reaction wheels now!
